channel.title: How do i make Admin/Mods on my server? plz help
channel.description:
I got the Hiyascape Base Created by d 3 3.
I went to Data then Adminstrators and added my name, but im not admin, what am i doing wrong?
thanks for any help you can give.

item.title: How do i make Admin/Mods on my server? plz help
item.dc:creator: @TryMe TryMe

item.title: How do i make Admin/Mods on my server? plz help
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

[quote=“xoMRKSxo, post:14, topic:177225”]Ok, im not interested into learning java im trying to be nice and help out a friend, nor do i care for SPAM.

All i need to know is how to make A Admin Or Mod

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE, give me step by step instructions it would be greatly appreciated[/quote]

They really did just tell you but if you need STEP-BY-STEP!

  1. open up your source folder
  2. click ‘Characters’
  3. Click the person’s name you wish to edit.
    4.Change Whats highlighted red:

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = black rain
character-password = 111-130-131-49-14-120-143-119-67-161-114-246-169-24-167-20

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3027
character-posy = 3242
character-rights = 3
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = 127.0.0.1
character-lastlogin = 20080027
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 78530

0= regular player
1= mod
2=Admin
3=Staff
4=‘Hidden admin’ i guess

And if you cant follow this, I’m sorry but Leave.

Edit: Rofl, thanks… O.o waste of my timeeeeeeeeeeee!

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make Admin/Mods on my server? plz help
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

You know half the people that play RSPS’s coudln’t care less for learning Java? They are here to make a server and feel rich becasue they have great armors and a lot of money. This may sound dumb, very true tho. I got into private server’s becasue I thought if I played I got the items on my RS account [idiot yes I know-when I liked rs]. Then I later got into website design and started to asking the owners of the servers how too make them, and got intrested in learning to program with Java, and so I started to learn and here I am.

item.title: How do i make Admin/Mods on my server? plz help
item.dc:creator: @TryMe TryMe
item.description:
@TryMe wrote:

ok, um first go to character files. click the username that you want to make admin. this should come up
[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3164
character-posy = 3668
character-rights = 1
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection =
character-lastlogin =
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 1892
change character rights to 2 for player mod or 3 for admin

item.title: How do i make Admin/Mods on my server? plz help
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

[code]if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}

			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Yournamehere))
			{
				playerRights = yourrightshere;

}[/code]

replace yournamehere with ur username and yourrightshere with 1,2 or 3.

item.source: How do i make Admin/Mods on my server? plz help

item.title: How do i make Admin/Mods on my server? plz help
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

if(command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("USERNAME")) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 2; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name+" is now an Administrator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

else if(command.startsWith("givemod") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("USERNAME")) { String name = command.substring(8); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 1; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name+" is now a Moderator"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

else if(command.startsWith("giveowner") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("USERNAME")) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 3; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name+" is now a co-owner"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

else if(command.startsWith("demote") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("USERNAME")) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 0; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name+" is no longer a member of staff"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Read full topic
